shortdesc.ph: Enables or disables the dual-stream mode on the sender and sets the video stream.

p.codeblock: public abstract int enableDualStreamMode(boolean enabled, SimulcastStreamConfig streamConfig);
virtual int enableDualStreamMode(bool enabled, const SimulcastStreamConfig& streamConfig) = 0;
public abstract int EnableDualStreamMode(VIDEO_SOURCE_TYPE sourceType, bool enabled, SimulcastStreamConfig streamConfig);
Future<void> enableDualStreamMode( {required bool enabled, VideoSourceType sourceType = VideoSourceType.videoSourceCameraPrimary, SimulcastStreamConfig? streamConfig});

pd.p: The capture type of the custom video source. See .

Whether to enable dual-stream mode:
: Enable dual-stream mode.
: (Default) Disable dual-stream mode.
The configuration of the low-quality video stream. See .
